description:
Restore your sense of childhood magic and wonder with My Coloring Book! With this handy app, you can find plenty of drawings that will come to life, but only with your help.

Thanks to an amazing variety, My Coloring Book is suitable for all from children to adults. Younger kids will love the fun cartoon drawings while parents can spend some time relaxing with complex geometric pieces (like colorful mandalas).

Save your work for later and show off your artistic sense and skill to family and friends.

My Coloring Book features:
—144 drawings spanning 12 categories
—An extensive color palette
—Different drawing styles
—A Save & Load system for your drawings
—Relaxing background music

Start your colorful adventure now!
name: My Coloring Book
